message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me there?
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our original offers. How about we try $105?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you consider that?
I'm still willing to negotiate, Bob. I can offer you a slight discount from my previous offer. How about we try $102?
I'm still a bit higher than that, how about $98?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer you a small discount from my previous offer. How about we try $100?
I'm not sure I can go all the way to $100, but I'm willing to meet you at $97. Can you consider that?
